G.G87: WHERE ./aqd:exceedanceDescriptionFinal/aqd:ExceedanceDescription/aqd:exceedance shall EQUAL “true” /aqd:exceedanceDescriptionFinal/aqd:ExceedanceDescription/aqd:exceedanceExposure/aqd:ExceedanceExposure/aqd:populationExposed shall be populated
G.G87_SHORT: If exceedance is TRUE, information on population exposed must be provided
G.G88: WHERE ./aqd:exceedanceDescriptionFinal/aqd:ExceedanceDescription/aqd:exceedance shall EQUAL “true” /aqd:exceedanceDescriptionFinal/aqd:ExceedanceDescription/aqd:exceedanceExposure/aqd:ExceedanceExposure/aqd:ecosystemAreaExposed shall be populated
G.G88_SHORT: If exceedance is TRUE, information on area exposed must be provided

H.H0: Check if delivery if this is a new delivery or updated delivery (via reporting year)
H.H0_SHORT: Checks if this delivery is new or an update (on same reporting year)
H.H01: Compile & feedback upon the total number of plans records included in the delivery
H.H02: Compile & feedback upon the total number of new plans records included in the delivery (compared to any delivery for the same reporting year)
H.H02_SHORT: Number of new Plans compared to previous report(s).
H.H03: Compile & feedback upon the total number of updated plans records included in the delivery. Blocker will be returned if XML is an update and ALL localId (100%) are different to previous delivery (for the same YEAR).
H.H03_SHORT: Number of existing Plans compared to previous report (same reporting year). Blocker will be returned if XML is an update and ALL localId (100%) are different to previous delivery (for the same YEAR).
H.H04: Compile & feedback a list of the unique identifier information for all Plans records included in the delivery. Feedback report shall include the gml:id attribute, ./aqd:inspireId, ./aqd:pollutant, ./aqd:protectionTarget, /gml:FeatureCollection/gml:featureMember/aqd:AQD_Plan/aqd:firstExceedanceYear,
H.H04_SHORT: List of unique identifier information for all Plan records. Error, if no Plans
H.H07: All gml:id attributes, ef:inspireId and aqd:inspireId elements shall have unique content
H.H07_SHORT: All gml ID attributes shall have unique code
H.H08: ./aqd:inspireId/base:Identifier/base:localId must be unique code for the Plans records
H.H08_SHORT: Local Id must be unique for the Plans records
H.H09: ./aqd:inspireId/base:Identifier/base:namespace List base:namespace and count the number of base:localId assigned to each base:namespace.
H.H09_SHORT: List unique namespaces used and count number of elements
H.H10: Check that namespace is registered in vocabulary (http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/namespace/view)
H.H11: If aqd:AQD_ReportingHeader/aqd:reportingPeriod => 2013 aqd:AQD_Plan/aqd:exceedanceSituation@xlink:href attribute shall resolve to at least one exceedance situation in dataset G via namespace/localId.
H.H11_SHORT: If reporting period equal or greater than 2013, AQ must link to a valid exceedande situation (G)
H.H12: If aqd:reportingPeriod < 2013 and aqd:AQD_Plan/aqd:exceedanceSituation is empty aqd:comment must be populated
H.H12_SHORT: If reporting period before than 2013 and a valid exceedande situation is not provided, aqd:comment should be provided instead
H.H14: aqd:AQD_Plan/aqd:code should begin with with the 2-digit country code according to ISO 3166-1.
H.H14_SHORT: We recommend you start you codes with the 2-digit country code according to ISO 3166-1.
H.H16: aqd:AQD_Plan/aqd:competentAuthority/base2:RelatedParty/base2:organisationName/gco:CharacterString shall not be NULL or voided
H.H16_SHORT: You must provide the name of the organisation responsible for the plan
H.H17: aqd:AQD_Plan/aqd:competentAuthority/base2:RelatedParty/base2:individualName/gco:CharacterString shall not be NULL or voided
H.H17_SHORT: You must provide a contact point within the organisation responsible for the plan, this may be a generic contact point.
H.H18: aqd:AQD_Plan/aqd:competentAuthority/base2:RelatedParty/base2:contact/base2:Contact/base2:electronicMailAddress shall not be NULL or voided
H.H18_SHORT: You must provide an email address for the contact point within the organisation responsible for the plan, this may be a generic telephone number.
H.H19: aqd:AQD_Plan/aqd:firstExceedanceYear/gml:TimeInstant/gml:timePosition shall not be voided, NULL or an empty tag & shall contain content in yyyy format
H.H19_SHORT: Your reference year must be in yyyy format
H.H20: aqd:AQD_Plan/aqd:status xlink:href attribute shall resolve to one of http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/statusaqplan/
H.H20_SHORT: Your plan status should use one of those listed at http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/statusaqplan/
H.H21: aqd:AQD_Plan/aqd:pollutants/aqd:Pollutant/aqd:pollutantCode xlink:href attribute shall resolve to one of http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/pollutant/
H.H21_SHORT: Your plan status should use one of those listed at http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/pollutant/
H.H22: aqd:AQD_Plan/aqd:pollutants/aqd:Pollutant/aqd:protectionTarget xlink:href attribute shall resolve to one of http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/protectiontarget/
H.H22_SHORT: Your protection target should use one of those listed at http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/protectiontarget/
H.H23: Check and count expected combinations of Pollutant and ProtectionTarget at /gml:FeatureCollection/gml:featureMember/aqd:AQD_Plan/aqd:pollutants/aqd:Pollutant Sulphur dioxide (1) + health Sulphur dioxide (1) + vegetation Ozone (7) + health Ozone (7) + vegetation Nitrogen dioxide (8) + health Nitrogen oxides (9) + vegetation Particulate matter < 10 µm (5) + health Particulate matter < 2.5 µm (6001) + health Carbon monoxide (10) + health Benzene (20) + health Lead in PM10 (5012) + health Arsenic in PM10 (5018) + health Cadmium in PM10 (5014) + health Nickel in PM10 (5015) + health Benzo(a)pyrene in PM10 (5029) + health
H.H23_SHORT: Check and count expected combinations of Pollutant and ProtectionTarget
H.H24: aqd:AQD_Plan/aqd:pollutants/aqd:Pollutant/aqd:pollutantCode xlink:href attribute (may be multiple) shall be the same as those in the referenced data flow G xlinked via aqd:AQD_Plan/aqd:exceedanceSituation@xlink:href attribute (maybe multiple)
H.H24_SHORT: AQ plan pollutant's should match those in the exceedance situation (G)
H.H25: aqd:AQD_Plan/aqd:adoptionDate/gml:TimeInstant/gml:timePosition MUST be populated and its content in yyyy-mm-dd format if /gml:FeatureCollection/gml:featureMember/aqd:AQD_Plan/aqd:status xlink:href attribute not equal http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/statusaqplan/preparation, http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/statusaqplan/adoption-process or http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/statusaqplan/under-revision
H.H25_SHORT: Your reference year must be in yyyy-mm-dd format - rephrase it
H.H26: if /gml:FeatureCollection/gml:featureMember/aqd:AQD_Plan/aqd:status xlink:href attribute equal http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/statusaqplan/preparation, http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/statusaqplan/adoption-process or http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/statusaqplan/under-revision aqd:AQD_Plan/aqd:adoptionDate/gml:TimeInstant/gml:timePosition should not be populated
H.H27: aqd:AQD_Plan/aqd:timeTable shal contain a text string
H.H27_SHORT: Must contain a short textual description of timetable for the implementation of the air quality plan
H.H28: aqd:AQD_Plan/aqd:referenceImplementation shall contain a URL to document or web resource describing the latest version of full air quality plan. This MUST be valid.
H.H28_SHORT: Must contain a URL to document or web resource describing the last version of full air quality plan
H.H29: aqd:AQD_Plan/aqd:referenceImplementation must contain a URL to a document or web resource where information about the implementation of the air quality plan can be found.
H.H29_SHORT: Must contain a URL to a document or web resource where information about the implementation of the air quality plan can be found.
H.H30: aqd:AQD_Plan/aqd:publication/aqd:Publication/aqd:description must contain a text string describing the publication
H.H30_SHORT: Brief textual description of the published AQ Plan should be provided. If availabel, include the ISBN number.
H.H31: aqd:AQD_Plan/aqd:publication/aqd:Publication/aqd:title must contain the title of the publication
H.H31_SHORT: Title as written in the published AQ Plan.
H.H32: aqd:AQD_Plan/aqd:publication/aqd:Publication/aqd:author must contain the author(s) of the publication
H.H32_SHORT: Author(s) should be provided as text (If there are multiple authors, please provide in one field separated by commas)
H.H33: aqd:AQD_Plan/aqd:publication/aqd:Publication/aqd:publicationDate/gml:TimeInstant/gml:timePosition must contaong the date of publication in yyyy-mm-dd format
H.H33_SHORT: The publication date of the AQ Plan should be provided in yyyy or yyyy-mm-dd format
H.H34: aqd:AQD_Plan/aqd:publication/aqd:Publication/aqd:publisher must container a text string describing the publisher
H.H34_SHORT: Publisher should be provided as a text (Publishing institution, academic jourmal, etc.)
H.H35: aqd:AQD_Plan/aqd:publication/aqd:Publication/aqd:webLink must contain a URL to document or web resource describing the last version of full air quality plan
H.H35_SHORT: Provided url to the published AQ Plan should be valid

I.I0: Check if delivery if this is a new delivery or updated delivery (via reporting year)
I.I0_SHORT: Checks if this delivery is new or an update (on same reporting year)
I.I1: Compile & feedback upon the total number of Source Apportionments included in the delivery
I.I2: Compile & feedback upon the total number of new Source Apportionments records included in the delivery. ERROR will be returned if XML is a new delivery and localId are not new compared to previous deliveries.
I.I2_SHORT: Number of new Source Apportionments compared to previous report. ERROR will be returned if XML is a new delivery and localId are not new compared to previous deliveries
I.I3: Compile & feedback upon the total number of updated Source Apportionments included in the delivery. ERROR will be returned if XML is an update and ALL localId (100%) are different to previous delivery (for the same YEAR).
I.I3_SHORT: Number of existing Plans compared to previous report. ERROR will be returned if XML is an update and ALL localId (100%) are different to previous delivery (for the same YEAR).
I.I4: Compile & feedback a list of the unique identifier information for all Source Apportionments records included in the delivery. Feedback report shall include the gml:id attribute, ./aqd:inspireId, aqd:AQD_Plan (via ./usedInPlan), aqd:AQD_Attainment (via aqd:parentExceedanceSituation), aqd:pollutant (via Attainment link under aqd:parentExceedanceSituation)
I.I4_SHORT: List of unique identifier information for all Source Apportionments records. Error, if no SA(s)
I.I7: All gml:id attributes, ef:inspireId and aqd:inspireId elements shall have unique content
I.I7_SHORT: All gml ID attributes shall have unique code
I.I8: ./aqd:inspireId/base:Identifier/base:localId must be unique code for the Plans records
I.I8_SHORT: Local Id must be unique for the Plans records
I.I9: ./aqd:inspireId/base:Identifier/base:namespace List base:namespace and count the number of base:localId assigned to each base:namespace.
I.I9_SHORT: List unique namespaces used and count number of elements
I.I10: Check that namespace is registered in vocabulary (http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/namespace/view)
I.I11: aqd:AQD_SourceApportionment/aqd:usedInPlan shall reference an existing H document for the same reporting year same year via namespace/localId
I.I11_SHORT: You must provide a reference to a plan document from data flow H via its namespace & localId. The plan document must have the same reporting year as the source apportionment document.
I.I11b: aqd:AQD_SourceApportionment/aqd:parentExceedanceSituation shall reference an existing exceedance situation delivered within a data flow G and the reporting year of G & I shall be the same year via namespace/localId.
I.I11b_SHORT: You must provide a reference to an exceedance situation from data flow G. The exceedance situation must have the same reporting year as the source apportionment and refer to the same pollutant.
I.I12: aqd:AQD_SourceApportionment/aqd:referenceYear/gml:TimeInstant/gml:timePosition shall be a calendar year in yyyy format
I.I12_SHORT: Reference year must be a calendar year in yyyy format
I.I15: Across all the delivery, check that the element aqd:QuantityCommented/aqd:quantity is an integer or floating point numeric >= 0 if attribute xsi:nil="false" (example: <aqd:quantity uom="http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/uom/concentration/ug.m-3" xsi:nil="false">4.03038 </aqd:quantity>)
I.I15_SHORT: Source apportionments should be provided as an integer
I.I16: Across all the delivery, check that the element aqd:QuantityCommented/aqd:quantity is empty if attribute xsi:nil="unpopulated" or "unknown" or "withheld" (example: <aqd:quantity uom="Unknown" nilReason="Unpopulated" xsi:nil="true"/>)
I.I16_SHORT: If quantification is either "unpopulated" or "unknown" or "withheld", the element should be empty
I.I17: Across all the delivery, If aqd:QuantityCommented/aqd:quantity attribute xsi:nil="true" aqd:QuantityCommented/aqd:comment must be populated
I.I17_SHORT: If the quantification is voided an explanation is required in aqd:comment
I.I18: Across all the delivery, check that the unit attribute (.../aqd:QuantityCommented/aqd:quantity@uom) corresponds to the recommended unit (via vocabulary) of the pollutant found at aqd:AQD_Attainment/aqd:pollutant xlink:href attribute for the AQD_Attainment record cited by ./aqd:parentExceedanceSituation
I.I18_SHORT: The unit of measurement of the Source Apportioment must match recommended unit for the pollutant
I.I19: aqd:AQD_SourceApportionment/aqd:regionalBackground/aqd:RegionalBackground/aqd:total/aqd:QuantityCommented/aqd:quantity must equal to the sum of aqd:regionalBackground/aqd:RegionalBackground/aqd:fromWithinMS/aqd:QuantityCommented/aqd:quantity + aqd:regionalBackground/aqd:RegionalBackground/aqd:transboundary/aqd:QuantityCommented/aqd:quantity + aqd:regionalBackground/aqd:RegionalBackground/aqd:natural /aqd:QuantityCommented/aqd:quantity + aqd:regionalBackground/aqd:RegionalBackground/aqd:other/aqd:QuantityCommented/aqd:quantity
I.I19_SHORT: The total regional background source contribution must be equal to the sum of its components.
I.I20_SHORT: The total urban background source contribution must be equal to the sum of its components.
I.I21: aqd:AQD_SourceApportionment/aqd:localIncrement/aqd:LocalIncrement/aqd:total/aqd:QuantityCommented/aqd:quantity must equal to the sum of aqd:localIncrement/aqd:LocalIncrement/aqd:traffic/aqd:QuantityCommented/aqd:quantity + aqd:localIncrement/aqd:LocalIncrement/aqd:heatAndPowerProduction/aqd:QuantityCommented/aqd:quantity + aqd:localIncrement/aqd:LocalIncrement/aqd:agriculture/aqd:QuantityCommented/aqd:quantity + aqd:localIncrement/aqd:LocalIncrement/aqd:commercialAndResidential/aqd:QuantityCommented/aqd:quantity + aqd:localIncrement/aqd:LocalIncrement/aqd:shipping/aqd:QuantityCommented/aqd:quantity + aqd:localIncrement/aqd:LocalIncrement/aqd:offRoadMobileMachinery/aqd:QuantityCommented/aqd:quantity + aqd:localIncrement/aqd:LocalIncrement/aqd:natural/aqd:QuantityCommented/aqd:quantity + aqd:localIncrement/aqd:LocalIncrement/aqd:transboundary/aqd:QuantityCommented/aqd:quantity + aqd:localIncrement/aqd:LocalIncrement/aqd:other/aqd:QuantityCommented/aqd:quantity
I.I21_SHORT: The total local increment source contribution must be equal to the sum of its components.
I.I22: aqd:AQD_SourceApportionment/aqd:macroExceedanceSituation must be presented and must not be an empty tag
I.I22_SHORT: The macro exceedance situation relevant to the source apportionment must be populated
I.I23: Either aqd:AQD_SourceApportionment/aqd:macroExceedanceSituation/aqd:numericalExceedance OR aqd:AQD_SourceApportionment/aqd:macroExceedanceSituation/aqd:numberExceedances must be provided (just one or the other) AS an integer or floating point numeric > 0, no more that 2 decimal places expected
I.I23_SHORT: numericalExceedance or numberExceedances must be provided
I.I24: The content of /aqd:macroExceedanceSituation/aqd:ExceedanceDescription/aqd:exceedanceArea/aqd:ExceedanceArea/aqd:areaClassification xlink:xref must be provided and must resolve to a areaClassification in http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/areaclassification/
I.I24_SHORT: Area Classification is mandatory and must conform to vocabulary
I.I25: aqd:AQD_SourceApportionment/aqd:macroExceedanceSituation/aqd:ExceedanceDescription/aqd:exceedanceArea/aqd:ExceedanceArea/aqd:areaClassification xlink:href attribute shall match those /aqd:AQD_Attainment/aqd:exceedanceDescriptionFinal/aqd:ExceedanceDescription/aqd:exceedanceArea/aqd:ExceedanceArea/aqd:areaClassification xlink:href attribute for the AQD_Attainment record cited by ./aqd:parentExceedanceSituation
I.I25_SHORT: Area classification should match classification declared in the corresponding Attainment
I.I26_SHORT: Exceedence area uom attribute must be in Square kilometers.
I.I27_SHORT: Road Length attribute must be in kilometers.
I.I29_SHORT: A link to the exceeding SamplingPoint(s) and/or Model(s) must be provided [at least one]
I.I30: If, aqd:stationUsed and/or aqd:modelUsed are populated, these must be valid elements stationUsed must link To SamplingPoint via namespace/localid modelUsed must link to AQD_Model via namespace/ localid
I.I30_SHORT: If SamplingPoint(s) and/or Model(s) are provided, these must be valid
I.I31: The subject of ./aqd:macroExceedanceSituation/aqd:ExceedanceDescription/aqd:exceedanceArea/aqd:ExceedanceArea/aqd:modelUsed xlink:href attribute shall be found in /aqd:AQD_Attainment/aqd:exceedanceDescriptionFinal/aqd:ExceedanceDescription/aqd:exceedanceArea/aqd:ExceedanceArea/aqd:modelUsed xlink:href attribute for the AQD_Attainment record cited by ./aqd:parentExceedanceSituation
I.I31_SHORT: The exceeding AQ_Model must be included in the corresponding Attainment
I.I32: The subject of ./aqd:macroExceedanceSituation/aqd:ExceedanceDescription/aqd:exceedanceArea/aqd:ExceedanceArea/aqd:stationlUsed xlink:href attribute shall be found in /aqd:AQD_Attainment/aqd:exceedanceDescriptionFinal/aqd:ExceedanceDescription/aqd:exceedanceArea/aqd:ExceedanceArea/aqd:modelUsed xlink:href attribute for the AQD_Attainment record cited by ./aqd:parentExceedanceSituation
I.I32_SHORT: The exceeding SamplingPoint must be included in the corresponding Attainment
I.I33_SHORT: Spatial extent or administrative unit may be provided
I.I34_SHORT: Information on surface are or road lenght shall be provided
I.I35: WHERE ./aqd:macroExceedanceSituation/aqd:ExceedanceDescription/aqd:exceedance shall EQUAL “true” /aqd:macroExceedanceSituation/aqd:ExceedanceDescription/aqd:exceedanceExposure/aqd:ExceedanceExposure/aqd:populationExposed shall be populated
I.I35_SHORT: If exceedance is TRUE, information on population exposed must be provided
I.I36_SHORT: If exceedance is TRUE, information on area exposed must be provided
I.I37: aqd:AQD_SourceApportionment/aqd:macroExceedanceSituation/aqd:ExceedanceDescription/aqd:exceedanceExposure/aqd:ExceedanceExposure/aqd:referenceYear/gml:TimeInstant/gml:timePosition shall be a calendar year in yyyy format
I.I37_SHORT: Reference year for the population/exposure data in yyyy format
I.I39: /aqd:AQD_SourceApportionment/aqd:macroExceedanceSituation/aqd:ExceedanceDescription/aqd:deductionAssessmentMethod/aqd:AdjustmentMethod may be populated if ./aqd:pollutant xlink:href attribute EQUALs http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/pollutant/[1,5,10,6001] (via …/aqd:parentExceedanceSituation)
I.I39_SHORT: If the pollutant is SO2, PM10, PM2.5 or CO deduction assessment methods may be populated
I.I40: WHERE ./aqd:pollutant xlink:href attribute EQUALs http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/pollutant/[1,5,10,6001] (via …/aqd:parentExceedanceSituation), /aqd:AQD_SourceApportionment/aqd:macroExceedanceSituation/aqd:ExceedanceDescription/aqd:deductionAssessmentMethod/aqd:AdjustmentMethod/aqd:assessmentMethod/aqd:AssessmentMethods/aqd:assessmentType must conform to http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/assessmenttype.
I.I40_SHORT: If the pollutant is SO2, PM10, PM2.5 or CO a link to assessment type is expected
I.I41: WHERE ./aqd:pollutant xlink:href attribute EQUALs http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/pollutant/[1,5,10,6001] (via …/aqd:parentExceedanceSituation), /aqd:AQD_SourceApportionment/aqd:macroExceedanceSituation/aqd:ExceedanceDescription/aqd:deductionAssessmentMethod/aqd:AdjustmentMethod/aqd:assessmentMethod/aqd:AssessmentMethods/aqd:assessmentTypeDescription must be populated.
I.I41_SHORT: If the pollutant is SO2, PM10, PM2.5 or CO a Description of the assessment type is expected
I.I42:
WHERE ./aqd:pollutant xlink:href attribute EQUALs http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/pollutant/[1,5,10,6001] (via …/aqd:parentExceedanceSituation), at least one of /aqd:AQD_SourceApportionment/aqd:macroExceedanceSituation/aqd:ExceedanceDescription/aqd:deductionAssessmentMethod/aqd:AdjustmentMethod/aqd:assessmentMethod/aqd:AssessmentMethods/aqd:samplingPointAssessmentMetadata/@xlink:href or /aqd:AQD_SourceApportionment/aqd:macroExceedanceSituation/aqd:ExceedanceDescription/aqd:deductionAssessmentMethod/aqd:AdjustmentMethod/aqd:assessmentMethod/aqd:AssessmentMethods/aqd:modelAssessmentMetadata/@xlink:href must be populated and correctly link to D/D1b.
Cross check the links provided against D, all assessment methods must exist in D
I.I42_SHORT: If the pollutant is SO2, PM10, PM2.5 or CO a link to the assessment method in D or D1b is required via xlink:href attribute
I.I43: WHERE ./aqd:pollutant xlink:href attribute does NOT EQUAL http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/pollutant/[1,5,10,6001] (via …/aqd:parentExceedanceSituation), the following elments must be empty or not provided: /aqd:AQD_SourceApportionment/aqd:macroExceedanceSituation/aqd:ExceedanceDescription/aqd:deductionAssessmentMethod/aqd:AdjustmentMethod/aqd:assessmentMethod/aqd:AssessmentMethods/aqd:assessmentType ; /aqd:AQD_SourceApportionment/aqd:macroExceedanceSituation/aqd:ExceedanceDescription/aqd:deductionAssessmentMethod/aqd:AdjustmentMethod/aqd:assessmentMethod/aqd:AssessmentMethods/aqd:samplingPointAssessmentMetadata/@xlink:href ; /aqd:AQD_SourceApportionment/aqd:macroExceedanceSituation/aqd:ExceedanceDescription/aqd:deductionAssessmentMethod/aqd:AdjustmentMethod/aqd:assessmentMethod/aqd:AssessmentMethods/aqd:modelAssessmentMetadata/@xlink:href ; /aqd:AQD_SourceApportionment/aqd:macroExceedanceSituation/aqd:ExceedanceDescription/aqd:deductionAssessmentMethod/aqd:AdjustmentMethod/aqd:assessmentMethod/aqd:AssessmentMethods/aqd:assessmentTypeDescription ; /aqd:AQD_SourceApportionment/aqd:macroExceedanceSituation/aqd:ExceedanceDescription/aqd:deductionAssessmentMethod/aqd:AdjustmentMethod/aqd:assessmentMethod/aqd:AssessmentMethods/aqd:assessmentType
I.I43_SHORT: If the pollutant is NOT SO2, PM10, PM2.5 or CO the following elements are not expected: assessmentType, link to adjusting sampling point/model;assessmentTypeDescription;assessmentType
I.I44: If aqd:AQD_SourceApportionment/aqd:macroExceedanceSituation/aqd:ExceedanceDescription/aqd:deductionAssessmentMethod/aqd:AdjustmentMethod/aqd:adjustmentType is populated , WHERE ./aqd:pollutant xlink:href attribute EQUALs http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/pollutant/[1,5,10,6001] (via …/aqd:parentExceedanceSituation), the xlink:href must be "fullyCorrected" if another pollutant it must be "noneApplicable"
I.I44_SHORT: If the pollutant is SO2, PM10, PM2.5 or CO and DeductionAssessmentMethod populated, adjustmentType must be "fullyCorrected", else "noneApplicable"
I.I45: WHERE ./aqd:pollutant xlink:href attribute EQUALs http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/pollutant/[1,5,10,6001] (via …/aqd:parentExceedanceSituation), /aqd:AQD_SourceApportionment/aqd:macroExceedanceSituation/aqd:ExceedanceDescription/aqd:deductionAssessmentMethod/aqd:AdjustmentMethod/aqd:adjustmentSource must be populated & the content of the xlink:href shall conform to http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/adjustmentsourcetype, else this element must not be populated
I.I45_SHORT: If the pollutant is SO2, PM10, PM2.5 or CO and DeductionAssessmentMethod populated, adjustmentSource must conform with vocabulary, else "noneApplicable"

J.J0: Check if delivery if this is a new delivery or updated delivery (via reporting year)
J.J0_SHORT: Checks if this delivery is new or an update (on same reporting year)
J.J1: Compile & feedback upon the total number of plans records included in the delivery
J.J2: Compile & feedback upon the total number of new EvaluationScenarios records included in the delivery. ERROR will be returned if XML is a new delivery and localId are not new compared to previous deliveries.
J.J2_SHORT: Number of new EvaluationScenarios compared to previous report.
J.J3: Compile & feedback upon the total number of updated EvaluationScenarios records included in the delivery. ERROR will be returned if XML is an update and ALL localId (100%) are different to previous delivery (for the same YEAR).
J.J3_SHORT: Number of existing EvaluationScenarios compared to previous report. ERROR will be returned if XML is an update and ALL localId (100%) are different to previous delivery (for the same YEAR).
J.J4: Compile & feedback a list of the unique identifier information for all EvaluationScenarios records included in the delivery. Feedback report shall include the gml:id attribute, ./aqd:inspireId, ./aqd:pollutant, ./aqd:protectionTarget,
J.J4_SHORT: List of unique identifier information for all EvaluationScenarios records. Blocker if no EvaluationScenarios
J.J7: All gml:id attributes, ef:inspireId and aqd:inspireId elements shall have unique content
J.J7_SHORT: All gml ID attributes shall have unique code
J.J8: ./aqd:inspireId/base:Identifier/base:localId must be unique code for the Plans records
J.J8_SHORT: Local Id must be unique for the EvaluationScenarios records
J.J9: ./aqd:inspireId/base:Identifier/base:namespace List base:namespace and count the number of base:localId assigned to each base:namespace.
J.J9_SHORT: List unique namespaces used and count number of elements
J.J10: Check that namespace is registered in vocabulary (http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/namespace/view)
J.J11: aqd:AQD_EvaluationScenario/aqd:usedInPlan shall reference an existing AQD_Plan (H) document for the same reporting year same year via namespace/localId
J.J11_SHORT: You must provide a reference to a plan document from data flow H via its namespace & localId. The plan document must have the same reporting year as the source apportionment document.
J.J12: aqd:AQD_EvaluationScenario/aqd:sourceApportionment MUST reference an existing AQD_SourceApportionment (I) document via namespace/localId record for the same reporting year .
J.J12_SHORT: You must provide a link to a Source Apportionment (I) document from data flow I via its namespace & localId (for the same reporting year)
J.J13: aqd:AQD_EvaluationScenario/aqd:codeOfScenario should begin with with the 2-digit country code according to ISO 3166-1.
J.J13_SHORT: A code of the scenario should be provided as nn alpha-numeric code starting with the country ISO code
J.J14_SHORT: Short textul description of the publication should be provided. If available, include the ISBN number.
J.J15_SHORT: Title as written in the publication.
J.J16: aqd:AQD_EvaluationScenario/aqd:publication/aqd:Publication/aqd:author shall be a text string (if provided)
J.J16_SHORT: Author(s) should be provided as text (If there are multiple authors, please provide in one field separated by commas)
J.J17: aqd:AQD_EvaluationScenario/aqd:publication/aqd:Publication/aqd:publicationDate/gml:TimeInstant/gml:timePosition may be a data in yyyy or yyyy-mm-dd format
J.J17_SHORT: The publication date should be provided in yyyy or yyyy-mm-dd format
J.J18_SHORT: Publisher should be provided as a text (Publishing institution, academic jourmal, etc.)
J.J19_SHORT: Url to the published AQ Plan should be valid (if provided)
J.J20: aqd:AQD_EvaluationScenario/aqd:attainmentYear/gml:TimeInstant/gml:timePosition must be provided and must conform to yyyy format
J.J20_SHORT: The year for which the projections are developed must be provided and the yyyy format used
J.J21: aqd:AQD_EvaluationScenario/aqd:startYear/gml:TimeInstant/gml:timePosition must be provided and must conform to yyyy format
J.J21_SHORT: Reference year from which the projections started and for which the source apportionment is available must be provided. Format used yyyy.
J.J22: Check aqd:AQD_EvaluationScenario/aqd:startYear/gml:TimeInstant/gml:timePosition must be equal to aqd:AQD_SourceApportionment/aqd:referenceYear/gml:TimeInstant/gml:timePosition referenced via the xlink of (aqd:AQD_EvaluationScenario/aqd:sourceApportionment)
J.J22_SHORT: Check if start year of the evaluation scenario is the same as the source apportionment reference year
J.J23_SHORT: A description of the emission scenario used for the baseline analysis should be provided as text
J.J24: Check that the element aqd:AQD_EvaluationScenario/aqd:baselineScenario/aqd:Scenario/aqd:totalEmissions is an integer or floating point numeric >= 0 and the unit (@uom) shall resolve to the codelist http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/uom/emission/kt.year-1
J.J24_SHORT: The baseline total emissions should be provided as integer with correct unit.
J.J25: Check that the element aqd:AQD_EvaluationScenario/aqd:baselineScenario/aqd:AQD_Scenario/aqd:expectedConcentration is an integer or floating point numeric >= 0 and the unit (@uom) shall resolve to the codelist http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/uom/concentration/
J.J25_SHORT: The expected concentration (under baseline scenario) should be provided as an integer and its unit should conform to vocabulary
J.J26: Check that the element aqd:AQD_EvaluationScenario/aqd:baselineScenario/aqd:AQD_Scenario/aqd:expectedExceedances is an integer or floating point numeric >= 0 and the unit (@uom) shall resolve to the codelist http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/uom/statistics
J.J26_SHORT: The number of exceecedance expected (under baseline scenario) should be provided as an integer and its unit should conform to vocabulary
J.J27: aqd:AQD_EvaluationScenario/aqd:baselineScenario/aqd:Scenario/aqd:measuresApplied shall reference an existing AQD_Measures delivered within a data flow K and the reporting year of K & J shall be the same year via namespace/localId.
J.J27_SHORT: Measures identified in the AQ-plan that are included in this baseline scenario should be provided (link to dataflow K)
J.J28_SHORT: A description of the emission scenario used for the projection analysis should be provided as text
J.J29: Check that the element aqd:AQD_EvaluationScenario/aqd:projectionScenario/aqd:Scenario/aqd:totalEmissions is an integer or floating point numeric >= 0 and the unit (@uom) shall resolve to the codelist http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/uom/emission/kt.year-1
J.J29_SHORT: The projection total emissions should be provided as integer with correct unit.
J.J30: Check that the element aqd:AQD_EvaluationScenario/aqd:projectionScenario/aqd:AQD_Scenario/aqd:expectedConcentration is an integer or floating point numeric >= 0 and the unit (@uom) shall resolve to the codelist http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/uom/concentration/
J.J30_SHORT: The expected concentration (under projection scenario) should be provided as an integer and its unit should conform to vocabulary
J.J31: Check that the element aqd:AQD_EvaluationScenario/aqd:projectionScenario/aqd:AQD_Scenario/aqd:expectedExceedances is an integer or floating point numeric >= 0 and the unit (@uom) shall resolve to the codelist http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/uom/statistics
J.J31_SHORT: The number of exceecedance expected (under projection scenario) should be provided as an integer and its unit should conform to vocabulary
J.J32: aqd:AQD_EvaluationScenario/aqd:projectionScenario/aqd:Scenario/aqd:measuresApplied shall reference an existing AQD_Measures delivered within a data flow K and the reporting year of K & J shall be the same year via namespace/localId.
J.J32_SHORT: Measures identified in the AQ-plan that are included in this projection should be provided (link to dataflow K)

K.K0: Check if delivery if this is a new delivery or updated delivery (via reporting year)
K.K0_SHORT: Checks if this delivery is new or an update (on same reporting year)
K.K01: Compile & feedback upon the total number of Measures included in the delivery
K.K02: Compile & feedback upon the total number of new Measures records included in the delivery. ERROR will be returned if XML is a new delivery and localId are not new compared to previous deliveries.
K.K02_SHORT: Number of new Measures compared to previous report. ERROR will be returned if XML is a new delivery and localId are not new compared to previous deliveries
K.K03: Compile & feedback upon the total number of updated Measures included in the delivery. ERROR will be returned if XML is an update and ALL localId (100%) are different to previous delivery (for the same YEAR).
K.K03_SHORT: Number of existing Measures compared to previous report. ERROR will be returned if XML is an update and ALL localId (100%) are different to previous delivery (for the same YEAR).
K.K04: Compile & feedback a list of the unique identifier information for all Measures records included in the delivery. Feedback report shall include the gml:id attribute, ./aqd:inspireId, aqd:AQD_SourceApportionment (via ./exceedanceAffected), aqd:AQD_Scenario (via aqd:usedForScenario)
K.K04_SHORT: List of unique identifier information for all Measures records. Error, if no Measures
K.K07: All gml:id attributes, ef:inspireId and aqd:inspireId elements shall have unique content
K.K07_SHORT: All gml ID attributes shall have unique code
K.K08: ./aqd:inspireId/base:Identifier/base:localId must be unique code for the Measure records
K.K08_SHORT: Local Id must be unique for the Measure records
K.K09: ./aqd:inspireId/base:Identifier/base:namespace List base:namespace and count the number of base:localId assigned to each base:namespace.
K.K09_SHORT: List unique namespaces used and count number of elements
K.K10: Check that namespace is registered in vocabulary (http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/namespace/view)
K.K11: aqd:AQD_Measures/aqd:exceedanceAffected MUST reference an existing Source Apportionment (I) document via namespace/localId
K.K11_SHORT: You must provide a link to a source apportionment document from data flow I via its namespace & localId.
K.K12: aqd:AQD_Measures/aqd:usedForScenario shall reference an existing Scenario delivered within a data flow J via namespace/localId.
K.K12_SHORT: A link may be provided to Evaluation Scenario (J). This must be valid via namespace & localId
K.K13: aqd:AQD_Measures/aqd:code must be unique and should match base:localId
K.K13_SHORT: Unique code of the measure. This may be a unique local code for the measure or may be identical to the unique code used in K2.1.
K.K14: aqd:AQD_Measures/aqd:name must be populated with a text string
K.K14_SHORT: A short name for the measure
K.K15: aqd:AQD_Measures/aqd:description must be provided as a text string
K.K16: aqd:AQD_Measures/aqd:classification shall resolve to the codelist http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/measureclassification/
K.K16_SHORT: Measure classification should conform to vocabulary
K.K17: aqd:AQD_Measures/aqd:measureType shall resolve to the codelist http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/measuretype/
K.K17_SHORT: Measure type should conform to vocabulary
K.K18: aqd:AQD_Measures/aqd:administrativeLevel shall resolve to the codelist http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/administrativelevel/
K.K18_SHORT: Administrative level should conform to vocabulary
K.K19: aqd:AQD_Measures/aqd:timeScale shall resolve to the codelist http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/timescale/
K.K19_SHORT: The measure's timescale should conform to vocabulary
K.K20_SHORT: Information on the cost of the measure should be provided
K.K21: If aqd:costs provided aqd:AQD_Measures/aqd:costs/aqd:Costs/aqd:estimatedImplementationCosts should be an integer number. If voided /aqd:AQD_Measures/aqd:costs/aqd:Costs/aqd:comment must be populated with an explanation of why no costs are available.
K.K21_SHORT: The estimated total costs should be provided. If not, an explanation on the reasons for not providing it should be included.
K.K22: If populated, /aqd:AQD_Measures/aqd:costs/aqd:Costs/aqd:finalImplementationCosts should be an integer number
K.K22_SHORT: If the final total costs of the measure is provided, this nneeds to be a number
K.K23: If aqd:AQD_Measures/aqd:costs/aqd:Costs/aqd:estimatedImplementationCosts is populated aqd:AQD_Measures/aqd:costs/aqd:Costs/aqd:currency must be populated and shall resolve to the codelist http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/common/currencies/
K.K23_SHORT: If estimated costs are provided, the currency must be provided conforming to vocabulary
K.K24: aqd:AQD_Measures/aqd:sourceSectors shall resolve to the codelist http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/sourcesectors/
K.K24_SHORT: Source sector should conform to vocabulary
K.K25: aqd:AQD_Measures/aqd:spatialScale shall resolve to the codelist http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/aq/spatialscale/
K.K25_SHORT: Spatial scale should conform to vocabulary
K.K26_SHORT: Measure Implementation Status should conform to vocabulary
K.K27: aqd:AQD_Measures/aqd:plannedImplementation/aqd:PlannedImplementation/aqd:implementationPlannedTimePeriod/gml:TimePeriod/gml:beginPosition must be a date in full ISO date format
K.K27_SHORT: The planned start date for the measure should be provided
K.K28: If not voided, aqd:AQD_Measures/aqd:plannedImplementation/aqd:PlannedImplementation/aqd:implementationPlannedTimePeriod/gml:TimePeriod/gml:endPosition must be a date in full ISO format and must be after aqd:AQD_Measures/aqd:plannedImplementation/aqd:PlannedImplementation/aqd:implementationPlannedTimePeriod/gml:TimePeriod/gml:beginPosition. If voided it should be indeterminatePosition="unknown"
K.K28_SHORT: The planned end date for the measure should be provided in the right format, if unknown voided using indeterminatePosition="unknown"
K.K29: aqd:AQD_Measures/aqd:plannedImplementation/aqd:PlannedImplementation/aqd:implementationActualTimePeriod/gml:TimePeriod/gml:beginPosition must be a date in full ISO date format
K.K29_SHORT: The planned start date for the measure should be provided
K.K30: If not voided, aqd:AQD_Measures/aqd:plannedImplementation/aqd:PlannedImplementation/aqd:implementationActualTimePeriod/gml:TimePeriod/gml:endPosition must be a date in full ISO format and must be after aqd:AQD_Measures/aqd:plannedImplementation/aqd:PlannedImplementation/aqd:implementationActualTimePeriod/gml:TimePeriod/gml:beginPosition. If voided it should be indeterminatePosition="unknown"
K.K30_SHORT: The planned end date for the measure should be provided in the right format, if unknown voided using indeterminatePosition="unknown"
K.K31: aqd:AQD_Measures/aqd:plannedImplementation/aqd:PlannedImplementation/aqd:plannedFullEffectDate/gml:TimeInstant/gml:timePosition to be provided in the following format yyyy or yyyy-mm-dd
K.K31_SHORT: The full effect date of the measure must be provided and the format to be yyyy or yyyy-mm-dd
K.K33: A text string may be provided under aqd:AQD_Measures/aqd:plannedImplementation/aqd:PlannedImplementation/aqd:monitoringProgressIndicators ; If voided an explanation of why this information unavailable shall be provided in /aqd:AQD_Measures/aqd:plannedImplementation/aqd:PlannedImplementation/aqd:comment
K.K33_SHORT: If monitoring progress indicators are not provided as text, an explanation is expected under aqd:comment
K.K34: Check that the element aqd:AQD_Measures/aqd:reductionOfEmissions/aqd:QuantityCommented/aqd:quantity is an integer or floating point numeric >= 0 if attribute xsi:nil="false" (example: <aqd:quantity uom="http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/uom/emission/t.year-1" xsi:nil="false">273</aqd:quantity>)
K.K34_SHORT: Reduction of emissions shall be provided as an integer and unit should conform to vocabulary
K.K35: Check that the element aqd:QuantityCommented/aqd:quantity is empty if attribute xsi:nil="unpopulated" or "unknown" or "withheld" (example: <aqd:quantity uom="Unknown" nilReason="Unpopulated" xsi:nil="true"/>)
K.K35_SHORT: If quantification is either "unpopulated" or "unknown" or "withheld", the element should be empty
K.K36: If aqd:QuantityCommented/aqd:quantity attribute xsi:nil="true" aqd:QuantityCommented/aqd:comment must be populated
K.K36_SHORT: If the quantification is voided an explanation is required in aqd:comment
K.K37: The unit attribute (aqd:AQD_Measures/aqd:reductionOfEmissions/aqd:QuantityCommented/aqd:quantity/@UoM) shall correspond to http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/uom/emission
K.K37_SHORT: The quantification of reductionOfEmissions should conform to vocabulary
K.K38: Check that the element aqd:AQD_Measures/aqd:expectedImpact/aqd:ExpectedImpact/aqd:levelOfConcentration is an integer or floating point numeric >= 0 and the unit (@uom) shall resolve to the codelist http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/uom/concentration/
K.K38_SHORT: The level of concentration expected should be provided as an integer and its unit should conform to vocabulary
K.K39: Check that the element aqd:AQD_Measures/aqd:expectedImpact/aqd:ExpectedImpact/aqd:numberOfExceedances is an integer or floating point numeric >= 0 and the unit (@uom) shall resolve to the codelist http://dd.eionet.europa.eu/vocabulary/uom/statistics
K.K39_SHORT: The number of exceecedance expected should be provided as an integer and its unit should conform to vocabulary
